ValidationRule.description: This rule prevents an order from being activated if the account is on credit hold. User Story SFDC-314, task SFDC-1960.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Activated'), NOT(ISBLANK( Bill_To_Account__c )), ISPICKVAL( Bill_To_Account__r.Status__c, 'Credit Hold') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This order can't be activated while the Account is on credit hold.
